name: What The Cave
description:
Description

An arcade rage game in which you must navigate a rotating cave world and stay within range of your only light source - a firefly. You also get attacked by flies who you must shoot. You can also use explore mode to explore the procedural generated cave system.

Controls

A+D - walk left and right

W or SPACE - jump and double jump

Left Mouse - shoot webs

Esc - main menu button

Goal

Stay within the fireflies light. You can't leave the light for more than 5 seconds.

In Normal and Impossible mode, flies spawn and chase you. You can shoot them with webs or else, if they touch you, you die.

Beat your own or your friends high score

CHALLENGE

My current impossible high score is 52. If you beat it, send me screenshot proof and I'll update the description

Credits

Song: Lloyd Murphy (deepsea on spotify)
